Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 128th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1970...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Cleveland on 2/13/1970 (Going to CHW: RF O. Velez. Going to CLE: LF H. Speed)...
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1973...
Injured on 6/27/1977 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Released by Cincinnati on 4/1/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
